9.name: Ixaocan
9.desc: Each time players star up 20 units, all players gain increasingly valuable loot.

9.name: Valar's Hollow
9.desc: On stage 4-2 gain a component item anvil. On 6-2, gain a Support item anvil.

9.name: Finn's Market
9.desc: Twice per game, Bilgewater Trader Finn will randomly appear and offer Completed, Artifact, Support, or Radiant items. You can choose one to keep for free!

9.name: Slaughter Docks
9.desc: Gain free shop rerolls equal to the stage number plus 1 at the start of every other stage, beginning at stage 3! These only last for the round you get them.

9.name: Cardinal Arcology
9.desc: You will always be offered a Silver, Gold, and Prismatic augment, in that order.

9.name: Rat Town
9.desc: Starting at stage 2, Lucky Shops appear randomly once per stage. These feature units tailored to your army's active traits.

9.name: Serpentine River
9.desc: The stage 2 and 4 carousels are replaced by voting rounds. Everyone gets a component anvil and the winning reward!

9.name: Valar's Hollow
9.desc: On stage 2-3 gain a component item anvil. On 3-3, gain a Support item anvil.

9.name: Slaughter Docks
9.desc: Gain free shop rerolls equal to the stage number plus 1 at the start of each stage! These only last for the round you get them.

9.name: Rat Town
9.desc: Starting at stage 3, Lucky Shops appear randomly once per stage. These feature units tailored to your army's active traits.

9.name: Warlord's Palace
9.desc: Stage 4-7 is replaced by a treasure armory round. Each reroll costs 1.

9.name: Yorick's Graveyard
9.desc: Every time a player dies, all players open an armory containing 4 of the eliminated players' items.

9.name: The Sump
9.desc: There is no interest this game. Instead, starting on stage 2-1, gain 3 gold every round.

9.name: Immortal Bastion
9.desc: Players start with 115 health.

9.name: Thresh's Sanctum
9.desc: When ANY unit dies, collect their soul. Every 40 souls, gain a loot orb.

9.name: House Lightshield
9.desc: Gain a Crown of Demacia on stage 3-1. If the holder dies, you instantly lose the fight.

9.name: Hall of the Nine
9.desc: At the start of every other stage, everyone gets the same loot from a highly varied pool.

9.name: Placidium Library
9.desc: Gain a Scroll of Knowledge on stage 3-5. Use it on a champion to open an armory offering every emblem that matches their traits.

9.name: Hearth-Home
9.desc: On stage 4-5, gain a Masterwork Upgrade consumable that lets you upgrade one equipped item into its radiant version.

9.name: Targon Prime
9.desc: When you reach 40 Health, receive a blessing from the Targonian gods.

9.name: House Lightshield
9.desc: Gain a Crown of Demacia on stage 2-1. If the holder dies, you instantly lose the fight.

9.name: Ornn's Forge
9.desc: Randomly on either stage 2-5 or 3-5, gain an Artifact Anvil.

9.name: Immortal Bastion
9.desc: Players start with 115 health.

9.name: Shuriman Bazaar
9.desc: Each champion on a component carousel has 2 components on them instead of 1.

9.name: Ecliptic Vaults
9.desc: Every time you select an augment, gain 4 gold per augment you have.

9.name: Marus Omegnum
9.desc: On stage 2-5 and 4-5, gain a Tactician's Crown.

9.name: Thresh's Sanctum
9.desc: When ANY unit dies, collect their soul. Every 20 souls, gain a loot orb.

9.name: Shifting Sands
9.desc: At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

9.name: Hall of the Nine
9.desc: At the start of each stage, everyone gets the same loot from a highly varied pool.

9.name: Unstable Rift
9.desc: Gain an unstable completed item that pops off and transforms into a random item every round.

9.name: God-Willow's Grove
9.desc: A spot on your bench becomes the grove. The champion placed in it contributes their non-unique traits as though they were in your army.

9.name: Stillwater Hold
9.desc: Whenever you would be offered an augment, gain a completed item anvil instead.

9.name: The Dreaming Pool
9.desc: At the start of each stage, gain a champion that fits your team.

9.name: Fleshing Arena
9.desc: Twice per stage, get a free high-tier champion. The champion's tier increases with game time.

9.name: The Summit
9.desc: Starting at stage 2, gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator at the start of every other stage. On stage 6 and beyond, gain a Champion Duplicator instead.

9.name: Glasc Industries
9.desc: Every time you build a completed item, gain 3 gold.

9.name: Bandle Cafeteria
9.desc: Gain a Spatula on stage 3-1. Each round, champions equipped with Spatulas feed Poro Snax to their closest ally and grant them 40 permanent Health for each Spatula component they have.

9.name: Yuumi's Zoom Zone
9.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2.

9.name: Targon Prime
9.desc: When you reach 10 Health, receive a blessing from the Targonian gods.

9.name: The Summit
9.desc: Starting at stage 3, gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator at the start of each stage. On stage 5 and beyond, gain a Champion Duplicator instead.

9.name: Ornn's Forge
9.desc: Randomly on either stage 4-1 or 6-3, gain an Artifact Anvil.

9.name: Ehrenmount
9.desc: Gain 3 component anvils at the start of the game.

9.name: Scuttle Puddle
9.desc: PvE monsters are replaced by scuttle crabs that grant extra loot.

9.name: Noxkraya
9.desc: Each time you take an augment, a random arena hex appears. Champions on an arena hex gain an item that they can use.

9.desc: The first augment offered this game will be prismatic.

9.desc: All augments offered this game will be prismatic.

9.desc: On stage 7-1, gain a Masterwork Upgrade consumable that lets you upgrade one equipped item into its radiant version.

9.desc: Stage 7-1 is replaced by a treasure armory round. Each reroll costs 1.

9.desc: Once per stage, get a free high-tier unit. The unit's tier increases with game time.

9.name: Bandle Cafeteria
9.desc: Gain a Spatula on stage 2-1. Each round, champions equipped with Spatulas feed Poro Snax to their closest ally and grant them 20 permanent Health for each Spatula component they have.

9.name: Placidium Library
9.desc: Gain a Scroll of Knowledge on stage 6-3. Use it on a champion to open an armory offering every emblem that matches their traits.
